entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
